name: Avoid classes with excessive lines of code (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Classes with excessive lines of code including comments. A class with more than 1000 lines of code is considered as violation.
output:
This report lists all the Classes with excessive lines of code.

This QR provides the following information:
Class full name.
rationale: Class with excessive lines of code indicates that it is performing lot of operation and therefore will be difficult to understand and maintain.
remediation: Try to breakdown the class and reduce the lines of code to something manageable.

qualityStandards.name: Source Element Excessive Size
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid over-sizing of software elements

Consequence
Software that does not follow the principles of modularity causes excessive propagation of modification impacts

Measure Element
Number of instances where a file has too many lines of code based on a threshold value. The default threshold value for number of lines of code is 1000
